segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing in a puddle, but her face is so calm, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is just pouring water everywhere, and she doesn’t even glance at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to something, but she’s too focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip any second now, and then what?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and the floor looks slick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but she’s totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the dishes are even clean at this point.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to go wrong in so many ways.
segments.speaker: PAR
